0: origin

[1, 2, 3, 4]=>0,

23: 2-swap, (4 choose 2) = 6

[1, 2, 4, 3]=>22.999999932996047,
[1, 3, 2, 4]=>22.999999932996047,
[1, 4, 3, 2]=>22.999999932996047,
[2, 1, 3, 4]=>22.999999932996047,
[3, 2, 1, 4]=>22.999999932996047,
[4, 2, 3, 1]=>22.999999932996047,

26.25: 3-cycle (4 choose 3) * 2 = 8

[1, 3, 4, 2]=>26.249999923229144,
[1, 4, 2, 3]=>26.249999923229144,
[2, 3, 1, 4]=>26.249999923229147,
[2, 4, 3, 1]=>26.249999923229147,
[3, 1, 2, 4]=>26.249999923229147,
[3, 2, 4, 1]=>26.249999923229147,
[4, 1, 3, 2]=>26.24999992322914,
[4, 2, 1, 3]=>26.249999923229147,

27: two 2-swap, 3
[2, 1, 4, 3]=>26.999999920850776,
[3, 4, 1, 2]=>26.99999992085078,
